Act3Scene3.speaker: First Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: But who did bid thee join with us?
Act3Scene3.translation:: But who told you to come join us?

Act3Scene3.speaker: Third Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: Macbeth.

Act3Scene3.speaker: Second Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: He needs not our mistrust, since he delivers our offices and what we have to do to the direction just.
Act3Scene3.translation:: We can trust him because he's stated his instructions and they are identical to the one give to us.

Act3Scene3.speaker: First Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: Then stand with us.— Near approaches The subject of our watch.

Act3Scene3.speaker: Third Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: Hark, I hear horses.

Act3Scene3.speaker: Banquo
Act3Scene3.text: Give us a light there, ho!

Act3Scene3.speaker: Second Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: Then ’tis he. The rest That are within the note of expectation Already are i’ th’ court.

Act3Scene3.speaker: First Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: His horses go about.

Act3Scene3.speaker: Third Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: Almost a mile; but he does usually from hence to th’ palace gate Make it their walk.

Act3Scene3.speaker: Second Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: A light, a light!

Act3Scene3.speaker: Third Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: ’Tis he.

Act3Scene3.speaker: First Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: Stand to ’t.

Act3Scene3.speaker: Banquo
Act3Scene3.text: It will be rain tonight.

Act3Scene3.speaker: First Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: Let it come down! The three Murderers attack.

Act3Scene3.speaker: Banquo
Act3Scene3.text: O treachery! Fly, good Fleance, fly, fly, fly! Thou mayst revenge—O slave!
Act3Scene3.translation:: Oh treachery? Run, Fleance, run, run, run! Maybe one day you shall get revenge.

Act3Scene3.speaker: Banquo
Act3Scene3.text: O slave!

Act3Scene3.speaker: Third Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: Who did strike out the light?

Act3Scene3.speaker: First Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: Was ’t not the way?

Act3Scene3.speaker: Third Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: There’s but one down. The son is fled.

Act3Scene3.speaker: Second Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: We have lost best half of our affair.
Act3Scene3.translation:: We have failed half of our mission.

Act3Scene3.speaker: First Murderer
Act3Scene3.text: Well, let’s away and say how much is done.
